website_summaries.verdict: Updated camera captures high-resolution images. Attachments like hook and magnet help retrieve items from hard-to-reach areas.
pros: Can take pictures and record video, which is helpful for diagnostic work that needs to be explained or shown to customers
cons: Compatibility issues with certain iOS versions, so you’ll need to have the right one to use all recording and imaging capabilities

customer_reviews.title: Well built, small diameter, high quality video!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice well built endoscopic camera! Quality construction and easy to set up and use. Was able to look down the bore of my .22 rifle and my 5.56 mm rifle. Was also useful in tracing wire routes under the dash of my car. High quality video!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every toolbox.
customer_reviews.text: Many scope camera's are 9mm size and just barely fit in a 12mm spark plug hole. This BlueFire is 5.5mm and just right for cylinder, crankcase and other small openings. Zoom feature is nice to inspect piston tops and bore wear. The 16 ft cable is too long for automotive, but probably good for plumbing and electrical applications.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: See everything you shouldn't be seeing
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome endoscope. I used it look into my ear. I originally bought a 720p version from another vendor, but after upgrading to this 1080p camera I can't go back. On top, it's wireless. Now i will mention that I don't think it's a good idea to diagnose yourself of a perforated ear drum, but i really wanted to see what was inside my ear. I'm sure there are other uses (much better uses lol), such as looking inside drains and stuff, BUT if you do decide to look inside your ear, please note the scope does get really warm after a few minutes. P.S. my ear is fine by the way, thank you for asking =P
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chang

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it a 4.5 star rating As it is a well made product. Reason for not a five star is that for my use the long focal point didn't work. I wanted to also use it as a bore scope for checking the lands in firearm barrels how ever as mentioned the focal point was too long for an accurate view. A lens attachment to shorten the focal point would make it a perfect multi function tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of uses! Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This snake camera is AMAZING! So many possibilities for use! I love that it came packaged so nicely and arrived so quick! Comes with a charger and instructions for how to use the app with it. The app was also really easy to use. It stores videos and pictures. I love that the cord is super long too which, is awesome cause the possibilities for use is endless! The light on the end of the camera is also a great feature. Its very bright too! I can't believe I never purchased one of these before. Super convenient for those hard to reach areas! Would also make a fun toy too. Imagine the pranks you could pull on someone!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Product really does work, and works well:-)
customer_reviews.text: I am a big science and animal lover, and I honestly cannot believe such a product exists for such a relatively inexpensive amount. Unlike another endoscope I tried, the instructions to get the endoscope image to appear on my smartphone screen was simple and effective. This is also a fantastic product for anyone who needs to look into any tricky crevices or if one accidentally drops a ring or other valuable items in a sink or toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pavilanis

customer_reviews.title: Rocket Science Degree Required
customer_reviews.text: My headline should be self explanatory. This device turns on fine, the light on the end of where the camera is works good but that is pretty much it. The instructions are completely lacking which is why I said you need a Rocket Science Degree to figure out how to connect this to your WiFi. I am tired of tech items lacking proper documentation and this one proves my point. If documentation is lacking, I can just imagine how the manufacturers customer support is like. Amazon did offer to give me technical support and I greatly appreciate their offer. This is NOT a point and click camera so it needs proper documentation otherwise it should not be sold. PERIOD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lelievre

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Water Resistant Endoscope is a Money-Making Inspection Cam
customer_reviews.text: The upgraded Bluefire endoscope is small enough to fit through tight spaces behind the car dashboard without removing any brackets, face panels or trim. The LEDs are bright enough to help get a clear HD picture and video of damaged components, even if they are black or dark gray. The recordable Micro SD card capability is a real safeguard that prevents customers from blaming us for pre-existing defects. How can you complain about a $30 wireless water resistant inspection cam. Use it at home or work. Wireless means you can keep the image steady while you maneuver the cam head around bends. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Uy

customer_reviews.title: The camera shroud is loose and can fall off the camera.
customer_reviews.text: I was bore scoping an intake manifold and as I pulled the camera out the small metal camera shroud, that contains the lens, came loose and fell off the camera - barely missed falling into the intake by about 1/8 inch. If this part had fallen into the engine, I might have had to remove the intake to retrieve it. I am not very happy with this product's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Great all around camera for any situation...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a different product (DEPSTECH) that has great reviews and ended sending it back as the quality was lacking in video and the material it was made of. Also it was not ridged even tho pictures showed it was. This on the other hand is hands down the best bang for your buck, very well worth the $42.00. Even the camera is smaller which tells you where the technology is going... you will love this camera It even has zoom :))) UPDATE, THE CAMERA BROKE AND I DONT KNOW WHAT KIND OF WARRANTY I HAVE AND WHOM TO CALL...
customer_reviews.author: luci pag

customer_reviews.title: Camera is good, app i garbage
customer_reviews.text: The camera has a very good lense and the lights are strong too. The issue here is that the only app that works with it will not work on any device. I tried on 3 iPhones, 1 iPad pro, 1 droid tablet, and an iPod touch, and nothing would even go through the set up process for the app. There were also 4 different operating systems in play here, all up to date. If they use another app, the review would be more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey D. Hazard

customer_reviews.title: Great tool at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The Bluefire inspection camera is one of the best values I have ever run across. I am restoring an old truck. Within a few minutes of opening the package, I took a very clear picture of the top of a piston inside the engine. Later that day I was able to determine how much fuel was in the tank, carefully making sure that the camera was never in the gasoline. This is a very valuable tool at a very reasonable price. My only knick is that the company needs to hire some better copy editors. The setup instructions were not easy to follow. Once set up is done, however, it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: ed gooch

customer_reviews.title: Great inspection camera
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm impressed with this product. The camera is super clear for being so small. The LED's are super bright and will illuminate any space you're inspecting. It is super ridged, but flexible enough to snake into any area. The app is easy to use to take photos or videos. The attachments make retrieving items easy, so far I used it to recover my wife's ring and earring when they fell down the drain in the sink. I haven't had to use the 90 degree mirror attachment yet, but it worked well during testing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: See it U will believe!
customer_reviews.text: Very important make sure Borescope is fully charged per instructions before using the first time. Read all instrustions you'll need to locate the wi-fi name of your camera, when you turn it on It willl not autosinc, so go to wi-fi on your phone and choose the name of the camera then they will. Then be amazed it is as good as it gets color awesome depth of field fantastic clearity just adjust the brightness. So if you didn't know any better you'd think you were right there.
customer_reviews.author: davidemanuel raneri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pair with phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the first borescope I have ordered or used so I dont have anything to compare it too. It is super easy to pair to your phone. I was a little sketchy about having to use a no name app to use it. The borescope is easy to use and the adjustable led lights provide sufficient brightness to see. I will update after I have used more.
customer_reviews.author: Raoul Duke online shopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery retention
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly good for what it is. A big CON for me is if you charge it and this thing sits for more than a week or so without being charged again the battery is dead. Seems like everytime i want to use it the battery is empty which kinda makes it useless. I guess i could make a reminder on my phone to charge it once a week, but come on...
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Incredible amount of "bang for the buck".
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with the product was when I attempted to use an app other than the one recommended. I tried others due to the overall rating of the app itself at google and had little to no success. Once I loaded the recommended app (Scope View), I was able to quickly set it up and use it with all features operating as they should. I highly recommend this even if it is just for another toy in your tool collection, the price is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R. Christianson

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: The software is finicky and unstable. It works ok on my iPhone 6S but keeps locking up on my iPad. The WiFi connectivity seems to work relatively well. The built in light is nice but I seem to get a lot of back reflection into the lens which causes bright white spots in the picture and makes it hard to see. Overall it's usable but definitely no more than three stars out of five. I give it a solid meh.
customer_reviews.author: J_Lebowski

customer_reviews.title: High Hopes. Big let down
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk. The quality is poor and the app is garbage. Camera worked for about 5 seconds before going black. Either a dud out of the box or faulty product. Either way, it’s getting returned
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Galtieri

customer_reviews.title: no directions???
customer_reviews.text: Mine did not come with directions. There is not a ton of helpful info online. Can someone else post their directions if they have one? Or otherwise tell me what to do. I tried to figure it out based on other peoples reviews, but the scope app SUCKED and nothing happens in my wifi when i turn the camera on. And YES I fully charged it before trying anything and it's lighting up properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Got it to inspect my water pipes for hardness deposits. App and image qualities are better than expected ie. Very good. I only used about 3’ of the camera cable, it is fairly firm and holds its shape well. Depending on intended use some may prefer a softer, more flexible cable. Hint: Don’t buy more cable length than you need as the firmness can become hard to deal with once it’s been reconfigured a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: Put this down the drain and I have to take him out a few times because it was getting too dirty the len and I couldn't see nothing
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Molina

customer_reviews.title: An invaluable tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this to check the bore of rifles 243/6mm and larger. As well as shotguns. Great for putting a small hole in a wall to inspect for wiring or plumbing, trying to find a pesky lost bolts or nuts when working on a car. Really like the brightening or dimming feature of the light, the ability to use the scopes control to remotely take the picture on the phone so both hands are free to control the scope. 100's of uses and still discovering more.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Riniker

customer_reviews.title: No Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: despite fully charging I could not get the blue light to flash so I’m returning this. Huge disappointment. Changing my review the instructions were not clear on which app to use so be sure to download “scope view” not “IP Scope View” Also the blue light does not need to blink in order to sync with Wi-Fi which is another error in the instructions otherwise very great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product find this just googling around on the web. Bought two of them one for me, and one for my son we love to fix things . WE are restoring my 72 Chevelle SS this will make this project more fun than it already is endless uses can't wait to find top dead center on the engine with this Enscope camera when we get ready to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive working scope
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I use it with a samsung tablet and the scope view app. Starts right up with no problems. The camera is small and go into tiny spaces. I use it for locating wires in walls. It does the job and without a high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: It was as expected & represented
customer_reviews.text: Upon initial trial it worked well, no issues setting up on Android. Easy to use. Have not tried it on an issue yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mic Will

customer_reviews.title: Is what it could be
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a cheap way to look at something once in a while. If you’re having a real need for this product to use all the time I would look at something else. I needed to find something in a dark area and I had to use a flashlight to give it enough light for the camera to show an image
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Have already used it to find a path for new wiring and check for plumbing leaks. A very useful tool!
customer_reviews.author: LC AK

customer_reviews.title: Not excited with it
customer_reviews.text: Not really excited with it. Too much of a pain to link up with phone. Useless where no wifi. Probably wouldn't recommend this
customer_reviews.author: LD Schlobohm

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Based on the ad, I was expecting high quality pictures and video. I got neither. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B. Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: Still not able to connect to Apple nor LG phone. I just gave it away hoping somebody can figure it out. I had somebody send me instructions but it still did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Texasmade

customer_reviews.title: Password will NOT work
customer_reviews.text: Once again I cant put the password into my phone. There are symbals and it WILL NOT let me enter them so it will NOT WORK. So frustrated
customer_reviews.author: E.K.D

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has paid for itself several times already. I have used it on several wiring and plumbing projects on my boat. Worked great! I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pardoe

customer_reviews.title: Probably will not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The charging port right out of the box was bad. You have to hold the cord at an extreme angle to get the charge light. Tries multiple chargers same result. Also the app on android phone crashes often with the picture resolution set high.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much junk
customer_reviews.text: Very confusing instructions. Had to reset the password every time I used it. It can't see up close. Focal point is about 6 to 8 inches. It will see the other side of my garage just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Gunsch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Fun product. Easy setup and use. Using it to investigate insides of walls and ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: John in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product to see where you can't without its help
customer_reviews.author: gordo89120

customer_reviews.title: Camera housing comes off
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and both times I lost the camera housing on the end of the wire. Without the housing, the wires will break. will not buy from this manufacturer again. Product works great the first few times it is used.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Regele

customer_reviews.title: For those hard to see places.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works just fine. Easy setup on my android phone. Took all of about 2 mins to do. Picture quality is better then I expected. Built in lights with adjustable brightness work great. All in all a good unit, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mellott

customer_reviews.title: Prefect little addition for mechanics toolbox!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Used it for looking inside a stuck brake drum.
customer_reviews.author: R. Allen Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this endoscope for fixing my washer, it led light on the head is really bright and you can adjust the brightness as you want, live feed is clear and enlarged. Very helpful tool.
customer_reviews.author: shop

customer_reviews.title: Used it 3 times in the first day it was received
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. We dropped something in the kitchen and used it to find it under the stove. We also used it to feed a wire into a hole behind furniture. It was a Christmas gift for my husband and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: nicole killinger

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: No issues yet. For the price it is worth it. Any homeowner/handyman or mechanic would love this. I use it at work to view critical parts that would normally take hours to tear down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where is BlueFire customer services?
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after 3 months. Got black picture. Can’t contact any customer services.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A-1
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our shop technicians. They use them to scope engines , tranny's , etc. great tool.
customer_reviews.author: BULL MONTEZ

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. App won’t hook up to the thing.
customer_reviews.author: VMC

customer_reviews.title: The product does not work
customer_reviews.text: That BlueFire Upgraded 1080P 5.5mm Semi-Rigid Inspection Camera does not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good service and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have used it on plumbing clog problems as well as my vehicle engine. I can't wait to use it for something else that pops up for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Diane O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: It worked good out in the open
customer_reviews.text: It worked good out in the open, but when I tried to look into the heating ductwork, I couldn’t make anything on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Reven

product_meta.title: BlueFire Upgraded 1080P 5.5mm Semi-Rigid Inspection Camera, 2 MP HD WiFi Borescope Snake Camera, Zoomable Focus 1800mAh Battery Wireless Endoscope for Android and iOS Smartphone, Tablet (16.4FT)
product_meta.description:
Features:
Upgraded Version wifi endoscope has made some upgraded improvements based on our previous yellow wifi endoscopes, which can support real-time video viewing, video recording and picture capturing, etc. Its 5.5mm diameter camera is much smaller and useful in narrow and hard to see places, such as vehicle repairs, sewer inspection, vent pipe inspection,etc.


Specifications: 
LED Light: 6 pcs Adjustable
Transmission distanc: 15 meters(without any obstacles)
Horizontal view angle: 60 degree
System: Android / iOS
Camera Resolution: 1920x1080,1280x720, 640x480
Best Focal Distance: 1-4 inch(zoomable focus)
Power Capacity: 1800mAh built-in Li-Ion battery
Working voltage: DC 5V/2A
Waterproof Grade: IP68(lens and wire only)




Packaging Content:
1 X BlueFire Inspection camera
1X Micro-USB Cable 1 X Manual 1 XMagnet 1X Hook 1X Mirror
feature_bullets: 【Upgraded Version】This wireless endoscope has made some UPGRADED improvements based on our previous yellow wireless endoscopes, the camera is MORE CLEAR and the battery works MUCH LONGER. Its 5.5mm diameter camera is MUCH SMALLER and USEFUL in narrow and hard to see places, such as vehicle repairs, sewer inspection, vent pipe inspection, etc. This camera tells you where the technology is going.

【Real 1080P Resolution Camera】This inspection camera has 3 HD resolutions(1920x1080, 1280x720, 640x480), if you choose the 1920x1080, you will see the SUPER CLEAR pictures or record HIGH QUALITY videos.
【High Capacity 1800mAh Battery】With REAL 1800mAh built-in Li-Ion battery, its working time can reach 3-4 hours, which is MUCH LONGER than most of other wifi borescopes that last LESS THAN one hour.

【Zoomable Focus Feature】You can zoom in or zoom out the picture or video to inspect some dark areas more clearly and accurately, you just need to press the “+” or “-” button to adjust it, which has 3 enlarged and narrow modes.

【Wide Compatibility & IP68 Waterproof】 This snake camera can support Android smart phone (Android 4.4 above) and iPhone or iPad (above iOS 6.0) or Tablet. (Note: iOS 8.0 lower system can not record videos.) This camera and cable is IP68 waterproof, you can use it in wet and dark pipes or underwater.(Note: the wifi box is not waterproof, although the camera is IP68 waterproof, we recommend you to use it underwater no longer than 10 minutes.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars122 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
